Title: India’s Gail seeks one cargo for delivery in June to Dahej
Description: India’s state-owned gas distributor Gail has issued a tender to buy one cargo for delivery on June 21-23 to the Petronet-operated 17.5 mtpa Dahej LNG receiving terminal in the western state of Gujarat. The tender closes tomorrow.
Author: CK

Title: First LNG reload cargo from Korea heads to Europe
Description: The 149,172 m3 Fuji LNG tanker is making its way towards the Suez Canal to deliver what is likely to be the first re-exported LNG cargo from Korea to Europe, according to Kpler data.
Author: CK

Title: Kuwait’s KPC seeks two June-July LNG cargoes for delivery to Al-Zour
Description: Kuwait’s state-owned energy firm KPC is seeking two LNG cargo for delivery across June and July to its 11 mtpa Al-Zour LNG receiving terminal through a tender that closes tomorrow.
Author: CK
